strings.Value: "Stop this right now, both of you! Shut up and get away from each other!"
"Regongar, are you so eager to get beaten up? I can arrange that — maybe even tonight!"
[Do not interfere]
"Regongar, stop this immediately! Leave her alone!"
"Valerie, I'm sorry. Regongar often oversteps."
"Regongar, what is the meaning of this? What do you think you're doing?"
"Let that be the end of it."
"Regongar, you can't act like that with other members of the party! Apologize to Valerie."
"Another trick like this, and you'll be spending a month... With no dessert."
"Definitely."
"Valerie, keep your hands to yourself."
"That was well deserved."
"Regongar, what were you thinking? You provoked that on purpose, didn't you?!"
"Valerie, cool off. Save it for tonight!"
"How can I stand and watch silently while you're being attacked?!"
"Yes. But I can't stop taking care of you."
"You could say thank you!"
"Valerie, pay no attention to Regongar. It's just what he wants."
"Our enemies are growing more and more powerful. For now we're handling them, but we need to treat state defense more seriously."
"Why, Valerie, are you afraid of being eaten by a troll? Maybe you should never have taken up a sword! The battlefield can be dangerous, you know — it's definitely no place for cowards!"
"I wasn't talking to you. And in the future, please mind your tongue."

"Or what? You'll start crying? If a girl from a nice family is afraid of trolls, she should have kept away from the {g|Stolen Lands}Stolen Lands{/g}! Sat in the temple of {g|Shelyn}Shelyn{/g} doing her embroidery!"
{n}Valerie clenches her fists.{/n} "One more word..."
{n}Valerie's face flushes crimson red.{/n} "I can't believe my ears! How shameful! Keep your entertainments to yourself!" {n}The warrior turns away with indignation.{/n}
"One more word — and what? You'll tell your parents? You wouldn't have the guts..."

{n}Valerie deals Regongar a deafening slap in the face. She's ready to draw her weapon, but the half-orc doesn't rush to fight, just angrily spits red on the ground. The warrior scoffs with contempt and turns away.{/n}
"Fine, fine... I wasn't saying anything."
"Ha ha ha... You're so shy!" {n}The half-orc chuckles.{/n} "So, tonight, right?"
{n}Your companions stare daggers at each other for a while, and then turn away.{/n}
"It's fine. I'm entirely untouched by the words of that... Brawler. I only hope he doesn't start something like that during a battle."
{n}The half-orc frowns and looks away.{/n} "I don't know. Just thought I'd do it. I'm just a fool... Thanks for stepping in before it led to bloodshed."
{n}Regongar and Valerie keep their distance and don't look at each other.{/n}
{n}The half-orc looks gloomily at you, then at Valerie, and back at you — then turns away without saying a word.{/n}
{n}Regongar clutches his head in mock horror.{/n} "Oh no, not that! Then I'm finished!"
"I can't wait!"
"Forgive me. I will try to be more restrained."
{n}In return the half-orc just scoffs angrily.{/n}
{n}The half-orc frowns and looks away.{/n} "I don't know. Just thought I'd do it. I'm just a fool. I don't know how you put up with me..."
{n}Valerie turns to you, shooting fire from her eyes.{/n} "I am entirely capable of handling this without your assistance!"
{n}Valerie turns pale with rage.{/n} "Keep your comments to yourself!"
"Ha ha ha... Someone is shy!" {n}The half-orc chuckles.{/n} "She must be mortally boring in bed, huh, {name}?"
{n}Valerie waves you off, enraged.{/n}
{n}Valerie is about to explode, but she suddenly exhales and casts a grateful look at you.{/n} "Really? Well, you're... that's very nice of you."
{n}Valerie drills holes in you with her eyes for a moment, then sighs.{/n} "I'm sorry. You're right, I overreacted." {n}The girl catches her breath.{/n} "I think I need to cool down."
{n}Regongar follows the girl with a heavy stare.{/n}
{n}Valerie smiles to you softly.{/n} "I always fall for his provocations. Thank you for stopping me in time."
{n}Valerie casts an arrogant glance at the half-orc and fixes a strand of hair that came loose.{/n}
